welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Abbots Langley, a charming town known for its picturesque villages and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience the beauty and hospitality that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Northolt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Benson Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
